website_summaries.verdict: A powerful machine that delivers multiple cleaning functions, exceptional results, and proven quality — all the best that Miele has to offer.
pros: Combines six speeds with silence setting, HEPA AirClean filter, and easy-to-maneuver Parquet Twister for unbeatable cleaning results
Has a comfort-grip handle, one-touch cord rewind, and Miele's renowned suction
cons: It's an expensive vacuum, but it's an investment that's built for long-lasting performance

customer_reviews.title: Not Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this less then 1 year ago with an average use of about once a week. Then the power head motor froze up and we are now looking for a local dealer for repairs. I'm not impressed at all with the vacuum quality as this should not be happening with less than a year of use. Can no one make a good vacuum that lasts a couple years? They are so fragile and we try to be so careful with them and it doesn't matter. Just frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Capt. Hrothgar

customer_reviews.title: Might have made a mistake
customer_reviews.text: I've had this vacuum less than a month and the power head stopped working. I've used the vacuum 5 times and thought there might have been something caught in the power head, however when I looked at it there weren't any obstructions. The brush turns freely and there isn't any burning odor from the motor. There is just no power to the power head. I purchased this $1100 vacuum to be the last one I ever buy and it lasted all of 12 days. So much for high end vacuums!
customer_reviews.author: mark miller

customer_reviews.title: The BMW of vacuums, but is it worth the price?
customer_reviews.text: I like the long cord and swivel wheels. The filter system is great. I am disappointed that the power brush is quite heavy. Miele should take some of the weight out. The steel wand is heavy too. Lighter materials exist. Why not use carbon fiber tubes? Not sure it is worth the cost. I think a better combo would be the powerbrush that comes with the “pets” model. I also wish the hose rotated at the plugin instead of forcing you to rotate the whole machine to uncoil it. In summary, I think it is overpriced for what you get. I hope longevity will make the high price a good value in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Way

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum ever
customer_reviews.text: Best vacuum ever! This is our 3rd! The other 2 still work very well, at our children’s. We have Maine Coon cats with lots of long hair, this vacuum gets the job done! The mini hand held for furniture is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: D. Brooker

customer_reviews.title: Back it goes......
customer_reviews.text: Straight out of the box it wouldn't turn on. After reinserting all the connections it finally did turn on. But then it happened again 20 minutes later! No thank you. Back it goes.... The 20 minutes it worked though I have to say were quite pleasant. It was quiet and the hardwood floor tool has incredible maneuverability. But I'm not spending $1100 on something that may or may not turn on.
customer_reviews.author: Momof5

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: After using so many cheap (and not-so-cheap) vacuum cleaners that would break or become less effective after only a couple of years, we finally decided to buy something to last. And are we ever glad we did! The difference is amazing. Quiet, powerful, adjustable, great filtration...it has everything. With three cats, pet hair and litter are challenges, but this handles them with ease. Our housekeeper (who brings her own vacuum cleaner) said it’s the best she has ever used. There’s a lot to be said for a well-engineered product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Having been raised as a child with the original Kenmore canister back in the 60s and as an adult having bought 4 during the last 30 years for my household, this one feels as if it will be as durable as those original models. This one has a lot of extra features, a better bagging and air filtration system, better hoses and is so quiet that you don't even hear it in the next room. It looks like it will be the last vacuum for us!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Have used many Kenmore canisters previously. This Miele is better in every way. Very quiet, powerful suction, excellent sealed HEPA filter system. Easy to maneuver. Long hose and extension wand. Automatic suction adjustment works well for different surfaces. This is a well engineered vacuum that's thoughtfully designed. Vacuum exhausts upward to avoid blowing dirt around. Filters and bags are easy to access and replace. Attachments work well. Bare floor attachment is best that I've ever used. Only problem I've had is that the telescoping wand retracts a few notches on its own when I bump into something lightly, like a wall. Hope this doesn't get worse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tremendously powerful vacuum with great carpet cleaning abilities and lots of attention to detail
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum will clean just about anything (including deep-cleaning carpets!) and has an astonishing amount of attention to detail on the features, from grooves you can park the cleaning head in (complete with a switch to auto-poweroff the vacuum while parked), to integrated attachment storage, to two different filters, to automatic suction power, and so on. Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Sourec

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for and this Sweeper doesn’t disappoint
customer_reviews.text: Hard to pay $1100 for a sweeper but the Miele C3 Marin doesn’t disappoint. During my research I discovered this particular sweeper is listed on the 2020 top 10 list as one of the best on the market. Only setback was The power head release button was broken During shipping and Amazon had to send us a replacement sweeper. The Miele company needs to use thicker styrofoam packaging to better protect components during shipping! Works great with automatic suction control as the power head glides over carpet, wood and tile floors. Very quiet as well and easy to maneuver!
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Dearth, Sr.

customer_reviews.title: I love my new Miele C3 Marin Canister Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Miele C3 Marin Canister Vacuum. Over the years I have had Electrolux, Rainbow, Clear Track (Amway), and lastly Dison. The suction of the Miele far surpasses all of the above, is easy to handle. The unique swivel feature is also very handy.
customer_reviews.author: ANN L GILLAND

customer_reviews.title: $1200 purchase comes in a partially open, heavily damaged box
customer_reviews.text: I expect any purchase to arrive safely intact, especially & highly expense product for over $1000. REALLY!
customer_reviews.author: ALI

customer_reviews.title: Great but not the amazing unit I hoped it to be
customer_reviews.text: I like the unit. Lite weight and quite compared to my old unit. The Marin head is heavy wish it was self propelled but does work well on my 'need to replace' high pile carpet. The control tube for the suction head is heavy as well. I do think the ability to adjust the length of the arm is a great feature. I'm taller than my wife so this is a great option. She will hate that the unit has too many features. She likes a basic vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Blair Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Me love Miele
customer_reviews.text: Such a great vacuum.... it is so worth the price. A family member has a similar Miele that has been bombproof with very few repair or maintenance issues for probably 12-15 years... now that's the kind of product that is worth a significant cash outlay. Really love this as much as you can love a vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: swivel rollers that move cleaner easily..
customer_reviews.text: There are features that make this vacuum cleaner a top quality item...thick unbendable tube...rotating attachments...swivel rollers that move cleaner easily....quiet performance...a system that does not leak dust...We love it, although nobody is fighting over who gets to vacuum yet.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel

customer_reviews.title: Heavy & Awkward
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with what I read online about this vacuum. However, the power head is quite heavy and the hose is awkward to use. The suction is good but per the write-up, it stated it changed power settings as you moved from one floor height to another. This doesn't happen. Also it is very hard to get the nozzles apart to change heads or use the accessories. I realize it may need some time to break in and I am a senior citizen so that may be part of the problem. I don't think I would recommend this vacuum wholeheartedly.
customer_reviews.author: Carol E Scheuermann

customer_reviews.title: This thing is quiet!
customer_reviews.text: One of the things that was always an annoyance with our previous vacuums is that they were noisy enough to be heard throughout the entire house. This unit is quiet and yet it still has really great suction. In fact the air rushing in to the suction hose is what makes most of the noise. A small negative aspect of this vacuum is its collection bag. To get a small accidentally vacuumed up item back, the bag must b taken outside and then cut open and all the dirt be pawed through.
customer_reviews.author: Armin A. Wolff

customer_reviews.title: Miss the power switch on the hose handle like our old cheap Sears had
customer_reviews.text: Quiet, follows you around fairly well, fairly heavy. Miss the power switch on the hose handle like our old cheap Sears had. Switch on this one only controls the beater bar. Suction great.
customer_reviews.author: CB88

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum is high quality and works great!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I bought a Miele vacuum. The quality is great and it works wonderfully! Not too heavy, I can carry it up and down stairs. I am older and this will be the last vacuum I buy so I wanted to make sure I was putting my money into a good piece of machinery. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DF

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Little Machine!
customer_reviews.text: Living in a two story home with 75% carpet. We’re having to carry it up and down the stairs fairly often. It’s electrobrush is usually transported up and and down separately for safety (only annoying bit; my wife is a shorter 4’11” woman). Apart from that, it’s this awesome over-engineered vacuum that has not disappointed yet! Really like the wheels and that it follows you around (not literally, you tug it around). Oh and the base model does come with some attachments inside of its hidden compartment.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Never thought a vacuum cleaner could be so good
customer_reviews.text: We have always used Kenmore (3 of them over 20 years), but this time Consumer Reports ratings convinced us to make the switch. After using it for 4 weeks we can confirm that it deserves the ratings. Need to make sure you get the right attachments though. We ordered a different attachment for our tile floors as the one in the box is great for hardwood and other floor types, but not for tile.
customer_reviews.author: David SW

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, versatile vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: After years of hating my old expensive Dyson vacuum, I finally took the plunge and bought this expensive vacuum cleaner. It is fantastic! Powerful suction. I was able to vacuum my entire downstairs without moving the plug. (The Dyson required 3 plug changes). It's great on carpets and floors. There is no dust smell. It is quieter than other vacuums. It is a bit heavy. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L Thomases

customer_reviews.title: Great quality canister vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but worth it! Great suction, lightweight & compact. Miele has A LOT of vacuum cleaners to choose from and it can be a bit overwhelming, but honestly I don't think you can go wrong with any of their models.
customer_reviews.author: Marc J. Plauche

customer_reviews.title: Close to perfect ... well, it IS perfect, no 'close' about it.
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This vacuum is so powerful and so quiet! Ergonomically it is perfect --> compact, steady (does not tip over, etc), and it is so easy to use. Plus it has those great "headlights " in the front. In other words, it lives up to the sterling Miele reputation! Recommended 111% !!
customer_reviews.author: Opinion-Said

customer_reviews.title: Excellent vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research on vacuum cleaners before purchasing the C3 Marin and could not be happier. It is light weight and glides easily. The suction is strong and I like the adjustable beater bar. Confirmation that I made the right choice is when I told my sister I purchased the Miele vacuum and, unbeknownst to me, she owns one too. My sister purchased her Miele 13 years ago and has had no problems. It is totally worth the investment!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: SEB 236 Electro Premium Powerbrush stopped working after a month
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M. Toth

customer_reviews.title: Compact, lightweight, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum arrived on time and intact. I'm really please with the easy maneuverability and that I can easily pick it up . The attachments are packed in an easily accessible compartment. It is also relatively quiet.
customer_reviews.author: dtp

customer_reviews.title: What a surprise in a canister
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first because I have used uprights for the past 10 years. But I gave this a shot because I heard of the air filtration, the power, suction, and the quiet ness of this unit. To my surprise this has been a fantastic machine very portable, very efficient, and clean. Would never thought that I would like a canister vac and Miele is the tops!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, worth the money if your vacuum needs to be a workhorse!
customer_reviews.text: The suction on this vac is powerful! My floors have never felt more clean. Very maneuverable and the telescopic wand and long cord range mean I can handle my 2900 sqft house with fewer outlet changes. I have 4 kids which translates to endless crumbs and my daughters have very long hair that the vacuum picks up with ease. Home has a mix of carpet and hard floors. The parquet twister is so gentle on my slate. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Murawski

customer_reviews.title: Can’t Beat This One
customer_reviews.text: Excellent vacuum. Pricey, but worth it if you are looking for one with excellent suction, maneuverability, and light weight.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line
customer_reviews.text: It's the Mercedes of vacuums. Miele is used in a lot of homes in Germany. It's a staple product like Kenmore/Whirlpool once was in the US. Miele, the vacuum, is super quiet, durable, and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Diedra Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Most convenient canister vacuum. Great upgrade from previous Miele product
customer_reviews.text: Previously had the Miele cat and dog canister vac, bought in 2014. This is a great upgrade. Lighter, easier to move around, the height of the handle/hose is adjustable, and there's a parquet floor attachment if you don't want the heavier carpet cleaner. The bag is smaller, but it's worth it for the space saving. They've reduced the number of attachments in the hood to just 3, which is really what you need. Many other little technological upgrades which are useful. Spiffy little unit. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: nospotsleopard

customer_reviews.title: My hone is now seriously clean cz of the suction and sealproof
customer_reviews.text: I luv my Miele Marin C3 — it is heavy duty which I love and why I couldn’t call it light weight in my rating, but that’s the beauty in Miele. It is quality machine that has great suction and is absolutely 100% leakproof. AMAZING! It is an expensive vacuum but worth every penny..
customer_reviews.author: terrell

customer_reviews.title: Comes with plenty bags.
customer_reviews.text: Runs very quiet. Large bag capacity. Fantastic suction power. Easy to manuever in corners and rugs. Would buy again. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Snowflake

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 dogs. I vacuum every other day. This is a very very good machine. Great suction, good tools and easy to move around. It was an investment that was worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Friedrich

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but well worth it
customer_reviews.text: If you have the money and you want clean floors, this is the vacuum for you.

customer_reviews.title: Not a quality MIELE Model.
customer_reviews.text: Vacuum clogs easily and fails to live up to the Miele reputation. We have used it in a small apartment for less than two years. Last week it sprayed dust all over the living room. My wife is asthmatic. She was wheezing, badly, for two days. This is dangerous! Obviously not the fault of the vendors - this is a manufacturing issue.
customer_reviews.author: PD

customer_reviews.title: For vacuum lovers!
customer_reviews.text: I love to vacuum. This vacuum is the best one I have ever used, and I used to have an electrolux. My only issue with this vacuum is that because the on/off and cord rewind buttons are large and on top, I sometimes hit them with the hose when I'm maneuvering it around. That is annoying but for all the other features, I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Kittie rein

customer_reviews.title: Could not be happier with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Just made the switch from a Dyson Animal upright to this vacuum and I COULD NOT BE HAPPIER!!!! So quiet compared to the Dyson it is unreal! I have multiple pets and this vacuum works FANTASTIC when it comes to picking up their hair. I love that there are many different settings on this vacuum, very helpful on the many different surfaces that I am cleaning. The canister is light and VERY easy to maneuver. Love the pivoting head on both the carpet and floor attachments. My old Dyson feels like a bit of a clunker now in comparison! TOTALLY worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Top notch vacuum!!!
customer_reviews.text: My second one of these to own. The last one I got 12 years ago. Worth the extra money. Light weight handles help my bad back.
customer_reviews.author: B. Papalia

customer_reviews.title: Rolls Royce of vacuum cleaners
customer_reviews.text: Great smooth, quiet but powerful and maneuverable vacuum cleaner, not inexpensive but I expect this to last the next 10 years..............stay tuned.
customer_reviews.author: Bernhard Spiess

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE Miele vacuum cleaners and this is no exception...VERY HAPPY with this purchase...Susan
customer_reviews.author: Susan J

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum is heavy to use
customer_reviews.text: the brushes on the power head for rugs and the floor tool are not very good very flimsy and I am sure they won't last
customer_reviews.author: PHYLLIS B.

customer_reviews.title: this is a very good vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: this is a very good vacuum cleaner. I had many vacuum cleaners in my life, electrolux was always my go to brand. But this seems to be as good. This did not come with a small beater attachment, thats the only draw back. The suction is very good. The best part about this vacuum is the hardwood floor brush. its the best I've used
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally I have a great vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. What a difference to my old vacuum cleaner that was pretty highly rated as well. I don’t like cleaning but vacuuming with this is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Satu S.A. Stechschulte

customer_reviews.title: The Cadillac of vacuum cleaners!
customer_reviews.text: A lot to spend for a vacuum, yes! But that being said, I couldn't be happier with the quality and suction power of this vacuum. Hoping it will last for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: Nice for carpets and hardwoods
customer_reviews.text: Perfect vacuum cleaner for my hardwood floors and oriental rugs. Only had it 2 days but happy so far
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Lehmann

customer_reviews.title: wow! Only be dipped!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! Makes me actually look forward to sweeping my house. Sreat swevice from Amazon to deliver on a timely manor.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lemasters

customer_reviews.title: Light Weight, Quiet, Easy
customer_reviews.text: The absolutely best vacuum cleaner, so quiet, so easy to change for floor levels tile to carpet, light weight.
customer_reviews.author: lynx141

customer_reviews.title: Power head never worked properly
customer_reviews.text: The power head on the Miele 3 never worked from day 1. Moving the head forward works fine, but when pulling it back, drawing it towards you, it stops working.
customer_reviews.author: Jeel

customer_reviews.title: Vacuum great, handle uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum itself is great. Quiet, sucks hard, HEPA filter. My two complaints are about the handle. It's heavy steel - why? - and the weird handle is downright uncomfortable and tiring to use. The split handle/hose was probably designed to make things better, but failed- instead the offset hose is always torquing the part in your hand. It wears you out. I'm tempted to only give this 3 stars because it's so tiring to use. My 40 year old Electrolux canisters have better handles. Come on!
customer_reviews.author: A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Loved my new Marin vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Long power corde, great suction and light- beats any stand-up for me bu miles.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Easy and efficient
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job on all types of floors and rugs. I especially like the auto feature. It is easy to maneuver and use.
customer_reviews.author: Susan A. Tolivar

customer_reviews.title: Suction and versitility
customer_reviews.text: All about quality and getting the job done. The first one we had lasted over 35 years and we're still using it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathie

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!
customer_reviews.text: The Best vacuum we have ever bought. The Marin is so quite and has the best suction of any vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: Mostly for hardwood floors but also tackles carpet well. Love the attachments.
customer_reviews.author: SWRIGHT

customer_reviews.title: 100% Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this vacuum. It is everything that it is advertised to be.
customer_reviews.author: BFS

customer_reviews.title: Feline approved
customer_reviews.text: So quiet even the cat slept through it. Super performance and easy to use. Love it! Worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rice

customer_reviews.title: Quiet!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new vacuum. So quiet and light weight. Almost make vacuuming fun. Almost.
customer_reviews.author: Huddle Blakefield

customer_reviews.title: Does not work on thick shag carpets!
customer_reviews.text: Good product. But wish I would have bought in store.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: The Miele does a great job of picking up dirt and pretty hair and ...
customer_reviews.text: The Miele does a great job of picking up dirt and pretty hair and the bag system makes it easy to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: David C. Utley

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful machine, but just too heavy for us
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful machine, but just too heavy for us. Sent it back and got a C1 that we are happy with.
customer_reviews.author: TTD

customer_reviews.title: Hands down, the best there is.
customer_reviews.text: Best vacuum I've ever had the pleasure of using! I just cleaned my Oreck out and did a side-by-side: no contest, the Miele was waaaaay better!
customer_reviews.author: Evan Mulcahy

customer_reviews.title: Quiet yet Powerful
customer_reviews.text: I love it, looks great feels great. Very quiet..yet very powerful. Comes with all the right tools that fit in the machine!! I use it on my wood floors and carpet. So happy I returned my Dyson for this.
customer_reviews.author: JayRay

customer_reviews.title: Worth paying more for
customer_reviews.text: It was worth the money. It is quiet and easy to operate. It has excellent suction and many different settings that are useful.
customer_reviews.author: Van

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about it. It does a great job and is very quiet to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 3 kids & a dog: great vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: Love! I was replacing a central VAC and really wanted a hand control. This is better than my central VAC. This glides smoothly across my hardwood floors, the wheels are a nice material. I do not feel they are scratching the floor up. Vacuumes the carpet great too! I am looking forward to cleaning my car next. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: E. Mcgettigan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This thing is just plain awesome. Buy a less expensive canister vacuum if must but there's no comparison
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: great vacuum. my only complaint is that it shuts ...
customer_reviews.text: great vacuum . my only complaint is that it shuts off when power bar is straight up.
customer_reviews.author: Rita V.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent so far. Power head is a little heavy but overall very good.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Most vacuums suck. This one sucks in the best possible way.
customer_reviews.text: Terrific unit. Works without flaw. Most vacuums suck. This one sucks, but in a good way.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony J Romeo SR

customer_reviews.title: One Big Flaw
customer_reviews.text: I have had this vacuum for a little over a year. Many complain about the bag and it’s price and the filter. It’s certified HEPA so you cannot reuse bags and filters. I have had no mechanical problems. The cleaning ability is the best of any vacuum I have owned. The only problem is the attachments that articulate to have proper ergonomics do not stay at selected angle after many uses because plastic nob stops wear out. If the angle locked properly this would be 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Dan S.

customer_reviews.title: Love this vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: My last home (for 23 years) had a central vac, so I was very concerned about getting a good quality vacuum that didn't make lots of noise and wasn't too heavy. I love my Miele! It is almost as quiet as the central vac, does an excellent job of cleaning and, while more cumbersome than the central vac, is manageable. My only 'complaint' is that the cord retract is on the right side of the vacuum where I would expect to push the power button. Hence, I too often retract the cord instead of turn the vacuum on or off! Nonetheless, I would highly recommend this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, well built and designed
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum was the highest rated cannister by Consumer Reports, which is frequently my go-to source for product selection. I have an upright vacuum and have a hard time taking it upstairs. This vacuum is very quiet, we'll built, designed and performs well. It's very expensive and I hope runs a long time.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mcfadden

customer_reviews.title: Makes vacuuming less of a chore
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum fixes all the things I couldn't stand about my previous Dyson. It's solidly built and parts secure tightly together and stay that way. It's quiet...so very quiet. The filtering has cut down on dusting tremendously. The controls are very well thought out and basic attachments are readily available. The cord management on my Dyson upright was horrible, on the Miele pushing a button quickly stores the cord away. No way around the price. It is very expensive, but for me it was very much worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Eric P

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $, especially with very plush carpet.
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough about this vacuum. We replaced all our old, but dense, carpet with new, even more plush carpet. Could not use my Dyson with it! Love the various suction settings and the height adjustment settings on the power head. My only complaint, the power head doesn’t have the built in bracket to attach it to the housing like the hard floor head. That is super convenient when both stopping during to pick up or move something, and for storing the unit. It helps control the hose. I also wish it came with a longer hose, but the pole does telescope, so that helps.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Love my vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Miele makes the best vacuums! I had a C1 for about 5 years and decided with my 2 super furry cats that I needed the head with its own electro motor, and I was right. This vacuum is heavier than my old one but it feels like it is a quality product and it is every bit as easy to use. The power head gets up so much more cat fur from our rugs that the C1, and the bare floor tool goes easily in any direction. I have only had it a short time but I expect it to live for many years, and make me so thankful that I finally decided to make the purchased.
customer_reviews.author: L. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Best Vac Ever!
customer_reviews.text: My house is already a lot cleaner and it is staying clean and dust free longer. My son's severe allergies are also much better. We are all sleeping more soundly with less snoring, too. If your family has allergies, get a Miele vac with the HEPA filter. It's worth the extra money. Get the Complete with the illuminated carpet head, too. Makes cleaning dark colored rugs and carpet much quicker and easier. My C3 Marin came with the parquet twister smooth floor attachment, too. It made my waxed hardwood floors look like I buffed them! GET THIS GEM of a VAC!!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Best Miele I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: I have had several Mieles and always liked them very much. My old one started to have suction problems, so I bought this new one, and it is the best I have ever had. Suction power is great and it is easy to manoeuver, like most Mieles. Will probably buy another one for our summer home.
customer_reviews.author: metasquirrel

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I have had this in my wish list for a long time. It's expensive but worth it. I like the durability of this vacuum along with it's options for power suction. Nice features are the LED lights on power head, on-board tools, and telescoping handle. I hope it last for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: BAR

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of its high rating in Consumer Reports and it has exceeded my expectations. I have owned a few vacuum cleaners over the years and this is much higher quality than any I've used before. It works great on rugs and hardwood floors as well as carpet. I will never go back to cheap inferior vacuums.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Tate

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth the Thousand Dollars
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this vacuum and well, maybe it's broken because it doesn't even pick up a piece of lint on my carpet. I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: shop a lot

customer_reviews.title: It won’t float...
customer_reviews.text: ...that aside, a remarkable vacuum cleaner. Never had a roller brush that didn’t tangle up with dog hair. Reason in itself buying a Miele Marin. Extremely well engineered. Easy maneuverability. In this case, you get what you pay for. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: M. Shulman

customer_reviews.title: Ah Yes - Finally a Good Canister Vacuum!!!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum cleaner surpasses the many canister models out there - excellent suction, excellent bag capacity, quality tools, lightweight but sturdy. Used on carpet, throw rugs, tile and hardwood - it gets the dirt out and doesn't spew dust back into the room air - excellent filtration. Not to mention how great the packaging was - everything was boxed in such a way that all parts were thoroughly protected from the ravages of shipping. Great product and worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No comparison to this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: My favorite feature of this vacuum will probably ALWAYS be it's self-retracting power cord. Our kids vacuum sometimes, which means they leave the vacuum out. At least I don't have to wind a cord three times a week. This vacuum has such incredible power, and it's the quietest vacuum I've ever interacted with. It has many modes to tailor how much suck you need. We've pretty much had every brand: Dyson, Kirby, Shark, Hoover. None of them hold a candle.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Keyser

customer_reviews.title: best suction
customer_reviews.text: i have owned top of line vacuum s for35 yrs n this one is the best. long cord. best suction n it moves behind you perfectly. comes with all attachments but i did spent 20 more n ordered the long extension to do corners n baseboards while standing up! i recommend this vac. over the lower price ones. n you will be happy to vac.
customer_reviews.author: linda ingles

customer_reviews.title: Awesome vacuum
customer_reviews.text: this is an awesome and very quiet vacuum. The carpet brush is the best I ever had. However, it is worth noting that the carpet brush is also quite heavy, which makes it a bit harder to move around than others. This is especially true, when you are using it on stairs.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: The most powerful, versatile and easily maneuverable vacuum I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum is a bit heavier than I'd hoped, especially the carpet tool, but everything else about it screams high quality and thoughtful engineering. The suction is easily adjustable as is nearly every other function, even the length of the wand. The most impressive aspect of it to me is the way the floor tool fits easily under cabinets and furniture and goes so precisely into corners, angles and edges. It makes vacuuming a pleasure.
customer_reviews.author: Clothes Horse

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Love this vacuum. It is higher priced than other vacuums but once you get over the sticker shock, you won’t regret the purchase. I have a golden retriever dog and this vacuum sucks up the hair with no problem. It has made the vacuuming chore much easier.
customer_reviews.author: JOF

customer_reviews.title: Like this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: So far really like this vacuum. It is quiet and I use it for wooden floors and area rugs. The bristles on the bare floor attachment are soft and it doesn’t feel like it’s scratching the floors.
customer_reviews.author: Grateful

customer_reviews.title: Sucks everything up!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my vacuum hungry wife. She has to vacuum almost every day. I cant stand the noise. I gor her this ans it is so quite! It works better than any vacuum i have purchased! Worth the extra money. It would be nice if it came with an extra bag...
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Broke on third use
customer_reviews.text: Brush in the head stopped working the third time I used it. Still waiting (more than a week) for the replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality, love that you can turn off and on the brushes easily. Very good suction. Rated durability low because I cannot know yet how it will last, we shall see. Very expensive vacuum, so hopefully it will be a lifetime purchase for me.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Best I've had
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my last Miele vacuum which broke after 15 years. These are wonderful vacuums and they will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Gary N. Comorau

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaning has a price
customer_reviews.text: I like the succion and the maneuverability of the devise. It is also much more quiet than other vacuum cleaners I have used. I have no regrets investing in this product.?
customer_reviews.author: Alain Fresco

customer_reviews.title: Motor running hot after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: One would expect after spending $1000 on a vacuum, that it would be more durable than it is. 2 months usage, 2x per week and now the motor is making a bad noise and it is running hot. Not impressed and feel jilted.
customer_reviews.author: G. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum ever!
customer_reviews.text: I really am loving vacuuming. Ha! However, this is definitely the best vacuum I have ever had in 50 years of housecleaning. I reported I did not receive the parquet twister floor brush in the box, which was NOT true; it comes with it, as well as the turbo brush.
customer_reviews.author: VT and VA

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Package Arrival
customer_reviews.text: Box was ripped and damaged— even with a huge hole. How can something that costs over $1k be delivered like this?!!! I will update my review based on usage, but right now I irritated the condition it arrived in.
customer_reviews.author: adb1908

customer_reviews.title: Excited to have this
customer_reviews.text: After many hoovers, eureka's , and kenmore vacuums this is the best. $$$$$$$ but so worth it
customer_reviews.author: KEW

customer_reviews.title: The best, lives up to its claims
customer_reviews.text: Simply spectacular small home vacuum with HEPA filtration. Transforms cleaning and noticeably reduces dust in the house. Small and light enough to make vacuuming easy, and good controls and accessories make it versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Boston

product_meta.title: Miele Complete C3 Marin Canister Vacuum Cleaner - Corded
product_meta.description: Configuration:VacuumMiele's Complete Marin vacuum cleaner features an Electro Premium electro brush ideal for cleaning low to high pile carpeting, rugs and smooth flooring. The Electro Premium electro brush is an electrically-driven carpet tool with wide brush roll and LED light for added comfort. With five adjustable height levels, the Electro Premium adapts to any pile carpeting. The Marin also includes the Parquet Twister - providing 180 Degree rotation for the agile, yet gentle care of smooth surfaces. Marin offers a savvy, self-adjusting Automatic setting. As you transition from hardwoods to carpeting, the Marin automatically decreases suction, then increases suction when you return to smooth, solid flooring - saving you both time and energy. A telescopic, stainless steel wand and long electrical cord, with one-touch automatic rewind, provide a total cleaning radius of 36 feet. Motor type - PowerLine

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars288 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
